page.title: 20LITTLE MILL W.I.
page.content: Our W.I.is an active group of nearly 50 members who cater for the market, charity events and visiting W.I.s. Members visit elderly residents of a local residential home when it is the elderly person's birthday.We provide teas every month at the local Cheshire Home. Monthly meetings, where speakers give an insight into a wide variety of topics, are held at the village hall. We also hear news from the County and National Committees which organise events for us.Competitions are held bimonthly with the person gaining the most points winning a cup at the end of the year. We can give a woman's opinion about impending legislation to government during the bill's consultative stage via the organisation so we are more than just "Jam and Jerusalem".
